infotexts.enhancedimmersion.camera.description: How much the player camera should zoom in.\nSet to 0 to disable.
infotexts.enhancedimmersion.periscope.description: How much periscope-controlled views should zoom out.\nAffects turrets, searchlights, cameras, etc.\nSet to 0 to disable.
infotexts.enhancedimmersion.aiming.description: How much the camera should be offset when aiming.\nAffects melee weapons, ranged weapons, and grenades.\nSet to 0 to disable.
infotexts.enhancedimmersion.sync.description: When checked, makes connected players use the same zoom configuration.\nUncheck to allow other players to use their own settings.
infotexts.enhancedimmersion.incompatibility.nteyes: Cannot change - incompatible with NT Eyes.
